about.body:
##                                                Thank you!

###### Thank you all so much for a wonderful 2025! 

###### We will be closed from Christmas Eve through January 5 to recharge and spend time with our people. 

###### Dinner service resumes on Wednesday, January 7. See you soon for a phenomenal 2026!

###### For more updates, follow us [on IG: **@cafemarsbk**!](https://www.instagram.com/cafemarsbk/?hl=en "@cafemarsbk")

###### [Reservations now available on **OpenTable**](https://www.opentable.com/booking/experiences-availability?rid=1278811\&restref=1278811\&experienceId=598476\&utm_source=external\&utm_medium=referral\&utm_campaign=shared\&covers=2\&dateTime=2025-12-17T18:00:00 "OpenTable")!
